column4: I need some help here.  I need help getting back my origonal desktop affects that came with ubuntu gusty.  I deleated them by accedent.
Anyone?
log out and goto a terminal ctrl-alt-F1 and rm -R .gnom* - should take you back to original desktop
will it deleat al my programs and stuff though?
it will take you back to square 1 as far as the desktop goes
cool thanks
it will rebuild from the default configuration setup
dident work
maybe i did it wrong
nope
wait, whats the command again?
now i cant switch between workspaces...
right click on your workspace icon, and add more workspaces
do u know the compiz packages that origonally come with gusty?
it wont let me, i keep adding rows and collums but nothing happens
maybe i should of had you remove .gconf directory also.
whats the good of removing stuff when i duno how to get it back?
brb
it will re-generate it
what shold i do?
it will re-generate it
what will?
you said "it will re-generate it"  what do u mean?
